messages.content: please help to fix gramma mistake and rewrite more professionally. "I spent 14 years in United to study and I had bachelor's degree in University of Texas. That's help a lot to build up system and good responsibilities for the system. I will take advantages of sales skills & experience and understanding of market to become a professional and bring a lot value to Customers. From that, I will contribute to development of our Company. I was working on F&B for 10 years, that's gave me a lot experienced on service customer with things a lot of nation. Get knowledge and be use on service, make customers be happy."

I spent 14 years in the United States for my studies and earned a bachelor's degree from the University of Texas. This experience significantly contributed to my ability to develop systems and foster a strong sense of responsibility within them. I plan to leverage my sales skills, experience, and market understanding to become a professional who delivers substantial value to customers. In doing so, I aim to contribute to the growth and development of our company. Furthermore, I have dedicated 10 years to working in the Food & Beverage sector, which has endowed me with extensive experience in customer service across a diverse clientele. This background has equipped me with the knowledge and skills necessary to ensure customer satisfaction.
Vâng, tôi có thể giúp bạn bằng tiếng Việt. Bạn cần hỗ trợ gì ạ?
